name: @fast-check/monorepo
description: Test making sure fast-check expose the right typings

scripts.build:all: yarn workspaces foreach --all -pvi --topological-dev --exclude website run build
scripts.build-ci:all: yarn workspaces foreach --all -pvi --topological-dev --exclude website run build-ci
scripts.test:all: yarn workspaces foreach --all -pvi run test && yarn workspaces foreach --all -pvi run e2e
scripts.unpack:all: yarn workspaces foreach --all -pvi --no-private exec tar -xf package.tgz --strip-components=1 --exclude='package/package.json'
